author: pietverwilligen
body: Use the newest ME0GeometryBuilder also for the M1 geometry (it was already in use for the M2 geometry where ME0 consist of 10 eta partitions). This PR provides the most detailed description of the ME0 Geometry also for the M1 geometry with a single eta partition. This PR is needed for studies the GEM Reco&Val group will perform on (eventually reprocessed by ourself) DIGI-RECO samples.
title: New ME0GeometryBuilder for baseline ME0 geometry
